text: Uzbekistan competed at the 2002 Winter Olympics in Salt Lake City, United States. ==Alpine skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !Race 1 !Race 2 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Time !Time !Rank |- |Komil Urunbayev |Slalom |align="center"|1:04.09 |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|DNF |align="center"|- |} ;Women {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !Race 1 !Race 2 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Time !Time !Rank |- |Elmira Urumbayeva |Slalom |align="center"|1:14.51 |align="center"|1:10.39 |align="center"|2:24.90 |align="center"|38 |} ==Figure skating== ;Men {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !Athlete !Points !SP !FS !Rank |- align=center |align=left| Roman Skorniakov |29.0 |20 |19 |19 |} ;Women {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font- size:90%" |- !Athlete !Points !SP !FS !Rank |- align=center |align=left| Tatiana Malinina |DNF |13 |DNF |- |} ;Pairs {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !Athletes !Points !SP !FS !Rank |- align=center |align=left| Natalia Ponomareva Evgeni Sviridov |27.0 |18 |18 |18 |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports *sports-reference Category:Nations at the 2002 Winter Olympics 2002 Winter Olympics
